titleStmt.title: Pammelia Musicks miscellanie. Or, Mixed varietie of pleasant roundelayes, and delightfull catches, of 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 8. 9. 10. parts in one. None so ordinarie as musicall, none so musical, as not to all, very pleasing and acceptable.
titleStmt.author: Ravenscroft, Thomas, 1592?-1635?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [John Windet for] William Barley, for R. B[onian] and H. W[alley] and are to be sold at the Spread Eagle at the great north doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title: Cum priuilegio.
Windet's, Bonian's, and Walley's names from STC and addendum.
Identified as part of STC 20756 on UMI microfilm reel 1002.
Reproductions of the originals in the Library of Congress and the British Library.
Appears at reel 904 (Library of Congress copy) and at reel 1002 (British Library copy).

place.placeName: the Spread Eagle at the great north doore of Paules
